ModMetaData.name: 环·战列巡航舰 Rim·Battlecruiser
ModMetaData.author: 空曜 / 卜丨卜
ModMetaData.description:
“是谁在呼叫舰队？”
这个Mod提供建造星港及其附属建筑，能够征召“战列巡航舰”加入战斗。 能够通过控制附属建筑的多少来控制Mod强度，星港周围2格内有越多的附属建筑，“战列巡航舰”的性能就越强。
CE： 兼容（但我不玩CE，所以强度可能会缺少平衡）（但是看样子机关枪跟大和炮不善于对付机械蜈蚣）
鸣谢 画师：卜丨卜 （没有这位画师，就没有这个Mod的发布） 技术指导：躲角落画圈圈（特效制作）、旋风（图层渲染）、22点下（召回代码）
"Who called in the fleet?"
This Mod provides the construction of Starport and its ancillary buildings, and can enlist "Battlecruiser" to join the battle. This Mod's strength can be controlled by controlling the number of ancillary buildings. The more ancillary buildings there are in the 2 spaces around Starport, the stronger the performance of the "Battlecruiser".
CE： YES(but I don't play CE, so the intensity may lack balance) (But it seems that machine guns and Yamato Cannon are not good at dealing with centipede)
English Translate: Machine translation.（So if you think English translation is not good, you can re translate it）
Acknowledgement Painter: 卜丨卜 （Without this painter, there would be no release of this mod） Technical guidance: 躲角落画圈圈（Effect guidance）、andery233xj（Layer guidance）、22点下（Recall guidance）
